metadata.title: CVE-2024-42009 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Roundcube through 1.5.7 and 1.6.xthrough 1.6.7 allows a remote attacker to steal and send emails of a victimvia a crafted e-mail message that abuses a Desanitization issue inmessage_body() in program/actions/mail/show.php.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
